013package org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.annotation.InvalidAnnotationException.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
021
022import java.io.*;
023import java.lang.reflect.*;
024import java.util.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils;
028import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
032
033/**
034 * Represents the metadata gathered from a parameter or class annotated with {@link Response}.
035 *
036 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
037 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HttpPartSerializersParsers">HTTP Part Serializers and Parsers</a>
038 * </ul>
039 */
040public class ResponseBeanMeta {
041
042   /**
043    * Represents a non-existent meta object.
044    */
045   public static ResponseBeanMeta NULL = new ResponseBeanMeta(new Builder(AnnotationWorkList.create()));
046
047   /**
048    * Create metadata from specified class.
049    *
050    * @param t The class annotated with {@link Response}.
051    * @param annotations The annotations to apply to any new part serializers or parsers.
052    * @return Metadata about the class, or <jk>null</jk> if class not annotated with {@link Response}.
053    */
054   public static ResponseBeanMeta create(Type t, AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
055      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(t).unwrap(Value.class, Optional.class);
056      if (ci.hasNoAnnotation(Response.class))
057         return null;
058      Builder b = new Builder(annotations);
059      b.apply(ci.innerType());
060      ci.forEachAnnotation(Response.class, x -> true, x -> b.apply(x));
061      ci.forEachAnnotation(StatusCode.class, x -> true, x -> b.apply(x));
062      return b.build();
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Create metadata from specified method return.
067    *
068    * @param m The method annotated with {@link Response}.
069    * @param annotations The annotations to apply to any new part serializers or parsers.
070    * @return Metadata about the class, or <jk>null</jk> if class not annotated with {@link Response}.
071    */
072   public static ResponseBeanMeta create(MethodInfo m, AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
073      if (! (m.hasAnnotation(Response.class) || m.getReturnType().unwrap(Value.class,Optional.class).hasAnnotation(Response.class)))
074         return null;
075      Builder b = new Builder(annotations);
076      b.apply(m.getReturnType().unwrap(Value.class, Optional.class).innerType());
077      m.forEachAnnotation(Response.class, x -> true, x -> b.apply(x));
078      m.forEachAnnotation(StatusCode.class, x -> true, x -> b.apply(x));
079      return b.build();
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Create metadata from specified method parameter.
084    *
085    * @param mpi The method parameter.
086    * @param annotations The annotations to apply to any new part serializers or parsers.
087    * @return Metadata about the class, or <jk>null</jk> if class not annotated with {@link Response}.
088    */
089   public static ResponseBeanMeta create(ParamInfo mpi, AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
090      if (mpi.hasNoAnnotation(Response.class))
091         return null;
092      Builder b = new Builder(annotations);
093      b.apply(mpi.getParameterType().unwrap(Value.class, Optional.class).innerType());
094      mpi.forEachAnnotation(Response.class, x-> true, x -> b.apply(x));
095      mpi.forEachAnnotation(StatusCode.class, x -> true, x -> b.apply(x));
096      return b.build();
097   }
098
099   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100   // Instance
101   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
102
103   private final ClassMeta<?> cm;
104   private final Map<String,ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> properties;
105   private final int code;
106   private final Map<String,ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> headerMethods;
107   private final ResponseBeanPropertyMeta statusMethod, contentMethod;
108   private final Optional<HttpPartSerializer> partSerializer;
109   private final Optional<HttpPartParser> partParser;
110   private final HttpPartSchema schema;
111
112   ResponseBeanMeta(Builder b) {
113      this.cm = b.cm;
114      this.code = b.code;
115      this.partSerializer = Utils.opt(b.partSerializer).map(x -> HttpPartSerializer.creator().type(x).apply(b.annotations).create());
116      this.partParser = Utils.opt(b.partParser).map(x -> HttpPartParser.creator().type(x).apply(b.annotations).create());
117      this.schema = b.schema.build();
118
119      Map<String,ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> properties = map();
120
121      Map<String,ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> hm = map();
122      b.headerMethods.forEach((k,v) -> {
123         ResponseBeanPropertyMeta pm = v.build(partSerializer, partParser);
124         hm.put(k, pm);
125         properties.put(pm.getGetter().getName(), pm);
126      });
127      this.headerMethods = u(hm);
128
129      this.contentMethod = b.contentMethod == null ? null : b.contentMethod.schema(schema).build(partSerializer, partParser);
130      this.statusMethod = b.statusMethod == null ? null : b.statusMethod.build(opte(), opte());
131
132      if (contentMethod != null)
133         properties.put(contentMethod.getGetter().getName(), contentMethod);
134      if (statusMethod != null)
135         properties.put(statusMethod.getGetter().getName(), statusMethod);
136
137      this.properties = u(properties);
138   }
139
140   static class Builder {
141      ClassMeta<?> cm;
142      int code;
143      AnnotationWorkList annotations;
144      Class<? extends HttpPartSerializer> partSerializer;
145      Class<? extends HttpPartParser> partParser;
146      HttpPartSchema.Builder schema = HttpPartSchema.create();
147
148      Map<String,ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.Builder> headerMethods = map();
149      ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.Builder contentMethod;
150      ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.Builder statusMethod;
151
152      Builder(AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
153         this.annotations = annotations;
154      }
155
156      Builder apply(Type t) {
157         Class<?> c = ClassUtils.toClass(t);
158         this.cm = BeanContext.DEFAULT.getClassMeta(c);
159         ClassInfo ci = cm.getInfo();
160         ci.forEachPublicMethod(x -> true, x -> {
161            assertNoInvalidAnnotations(x, Query.class, FormData.class);
162            if (x.hasAnnotation(Header.class)) {
163               assertNoArgs(x, Header.class);
164               assertReturnNotVoid(x, Header.class);
165               HttpPartSchema s = HttpPartSchema.create(x.getAnnotation(Header.class), x.getPropertyName());
166               headerMethods.put(s.getName(), ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.create(RESPONSE_HEADER, s, x));
167            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(StatusCode.class)) {
168               assertNoArgs(x, Header.class);
169               assertReturnType(x, Header.class, int.class, Integer.class);
170               statusMethod = ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.create(RESPONSE_STATUS, x);
171            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(Content.class)) {
172               if (x.hasNoParams())
173                  assertReturnNotVoid(x, Header.class);
174               else
175                  assertArgType(x, Header.class, OutputStream.class, Writer.class);
176               contentMethod = ResponseBeanPropertyMeta.create(RESPONSE_BODY, x);
177            }
178         });
179         return this;
180      }
181
182      Builder apply(Response a) {
183         if (a != null) {
184            if (isNotVoid(a.serializer()))
185               partSerializer = a.serializer();
186            if (isNotVoid(a.parser()))
187               partParser = a.parser();
188            schema.apply(a.schema());
189         }
190         return this;
191      }
192
193      Builder apply(StatusCode a) {
194         if (a != null) {
195            if (a.value().length > 0)
196               code = a.value()[0];
197         }
198         return this;
199      }
200
201      ResponseBeanMeta build() {
202         return new ResponseBeanMeta(this);
203      }
204   }
205
206   /**
207    * Returns the HTTP status code.
208    *
209    * @return The HTTP status code.
210    */
211   public int getCode() {
212      return code;
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Returns the schema information about the response object.
217    *
218    * @return The schema information about the response object.
219    */
220   public HttpPartSchema getSchema() {
221      return schema;
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Returns metadata about the <ja>@Header</ja>-annotated methods.
226    *
227    * @return Metadata about the <ja>@Header</ja>-annotated methods, or an empty collection if none exist.
228    */
229   public Collection<ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> getHeaderMethods() {
230      return headerMethods.values();
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Returns the <ja>@Content</ja>-annotated method.
235    *
236    * @return The <ja>@Content</ja>-annotated method, or <jk>null</jk> if it doesn't exist.
237    */
238   public ResponseBeanPropertyMeta getContentMethod() {
239      return contentMethod;
240   }
241
242   /**
243    * Returns the <ja>@StatusCode</ja>-annotated method.
244    *
245    * @return The <ja>@StatusCode</ja>-annotated method, or <jk>null</jk> if it doesn't exist.
246    */
247   public ResponseBeanPropertyMeta getStatusMethod() {
248      return statusMethod;
249   }
250
251   /**
252    * Returns the part serializer to use to serialize this response.
253    *
254    * @return The part serializer to use to serialize this response.
255    */
256   public Optional<HttpPartSerializer> getPartSerializer() {
257      return partSerializer;
258   }
259
260   /**
261    * Returns metadata about the class.
262    *
263    * @return Metadata about the class.
264    */
265   public ClassMeta<?> getClassMeta() {
266      return cm;
267   }
268
269   /**
270    * Returns metadata about the bean property with the specified method getter name.
271    *
272    * @param name The bean method getter name.
273    * @return Metadata about the bean property, or <jk>null</jk> if none found.
274    */
275   public ResponseBeanPropertyMeta getProperty(String name) {
276      return properties.get(name);
277   }
278
279   /**
280    * Returns all the annotated methods on this bean.
281    *
282    * @return All the annotated methods on this bean.
283    */
284   public Collection<ResponseBeanPropertyMeta> getProperties() {
285      return properties.values();
286   }
287}
